title: 10MIN full body pilates workout // de-bloating & flexibility // beginner friendly
description:
a perfect 10-minute full body movement for increased mobility, flexibility that will make you feel happy and relaxed, perfect for early mornings or some relaxing evening movement! 

Hope you have fun doing this workout! 
Love you all, Lidi x

♡ MORE OF ME ♡

disclaimer: 
I am sharing my personal workouts. If you experience any type of pain or discomfort during this workout, stop immediately, modify as necessary and/or rejoin me on another video. By implementing this workout in your routine, you agree and understand Lidiavmera limited will not be held responsible or liable for any injury that may occur as a result of this workout video.
channelDescription:
what a journey it is to understanding how to feel our best, so hey, lets do it together ♡ sharing my life as a 23 year-old living in London & my at-home workouts with you as a certified Pilates instructor (L3 pilates mat instructor) 
hope you stick around 🤍
ly all millions

comments: thanks so much lidia !! happy end of the year holidays everyone 💞
I love how calming and aesthetic your workouts are. Helped me relax after a stressful day ❤
OMG! I do your Pilates videos almost EVERYDAY!!!❤❤❤Merry Christmas Lidia, you’re my favorite YouTuber ever!!!!! Jesus loves you!!!!✝️🎅🏻🌟🕊️🎁❤️🛍️🪩

I love your workouts!! I recently got shoulder surgery and won’t be able to use my arm for 4-6 months.😢 I know this is a crazy ask and I totally understand if you can’t do it but if you could make a core workout that doesn’t use my right arm or any arms preferably it would be amazing and I very much appreciate it.
Omg TY so much! So glad I found you and this channel! I’m 51 and this was amazing! Saving in my favorites!
